name: top_artists_male
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool billboard_api.
Tool description: Providing the Billboard chart rankings and information on titles, artists, lyrics, images, and more. 
API description: Provide the YEAR-END Top Artists - Male chart information

If `year` is not supplied, will default to last year.

year.description: The year for which to retrieve the chart information in 'YYYY' format. Defaults to '2022' if not provided.
